message: I'm excited to introduce you to this incredible opportunity. This product has the potential to revolutionize the industry, and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to make a generous offer to get us started. I'll sell it to you for $2000000.

I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to pay that price for the potential benefits it could bring to my business.

I understand that $1200000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can see the potential benefits of this product for your business, and I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll sell it to you for $1800000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1800000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1500000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm confident that's a fair price for the product, considering its potential benefits to my business.

I can see that we're getting close to a deal, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $1500000. However, I'm still a bit concerned that we might be leaving some value on the table. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell it to you for $1600000, but that's as high as I can go. This is a fair price, considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm afraid $1600000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1400000, but that's my final offer. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle and get a deal done.
